title: South African Jazz legend loses battle with prostate cancer
text:
South African Jazz legend loses battle with prostate cancer 11:28am EST - 00:53 
The South African Jazz trumpeter, Hugh Masekela, who was also a leading figure in the anti-apartheid struggle has passed away at the age of 78 following a 10 year battle with prostate cancer. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The South African Jazz trumpeter, Hugh Masekela, who was also a leading figure in the anti-apartheid struggle has passed away at the age of 78 following a 10 year battle with prostate cancer.
